## Abstract

This project looks to show what, if any relationships may occur between adult levels of education, addiction and rates of
violent incidents.

### 1. Discovery and Data Preparation

Data for adult levels of education by county and state from 1970 to 2000. The data has been cleaned and tidied along with
graphed. <a href="deliverable1.html" title="Deliverable 1">Deliverable 1</a>

### 2. Model Planning and Building

Data for rates of violent crime by year and state. Modelling and prediction for those two datasets combined.
